definition: office/situation/classifier for games: match, set, round etc

sentences.english: A document from their meeting said the situation in Afghanistan is deteriorating.
sentences.chinese: 外長會議的一份文件說阿富汗的局勢正在惡化。

sentences.english: He can cope with the present situation.
sentences.chinese: 他能夠應付當前的局勢。

sentences.english: The current situation does not prick their conscience.
sentences.chinese: 當前局勢並沒有讓他們感到良心不安。

sentences.english: The heat is really up and I truly feel very saddened by the situation, " said Kraisak Choonhavan."
sentences.chinese: 氣氛的確很緊張，我真的對局勢覺得非常悲觀。

sentences.english: I hate to get this pessimistic about the situation. It feels panicky and overwrought.
sentences.chinese: 我不願對局勢如此悲觀，這讓我感到恐慌和過度緊張。

sentences.english: And I think U.S.-Iran relations can have a serious impact on the way things go.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲，美國和伊朗的關係會嚴重影響局勢發展。

sentences.english: It indicated that the situation was so critial.
sentences.chinese: 這證明了局勢已經非常嚴峻。

sentences.english: But the mid-term election made his position untenable.
sentences.chinese: 然而中期選舉的局勢讓他高位難守。

sentences.english: Egypt Strike Fizzles Amid Tight Security.
sentences.chinese: 埃及罷工失敗致使局勢緊張。

sentences.english: That newspaper has a very good analysis of the political situation.
sentences.chinese: 這份報紙對政治局勢作了很好的分析。

sentences.english: Now teachers rightly feel scape-goated for conditions that are often beyond their control.
sentences.chinese: 現在老師們會覺得無力因爲局勢超出他們的控制範圍。

sentences.english: But will its leaders succeed in stabilizing the situation in the near term?
sentences.chinese: 但是，其領導着能夠在短期內成功穩定局勢嗎？

sentences.english: It can create warmness or stress in relations based on current situation.
sentences.chinese: 它可以在目前的關係局勢上創造溫暖或壓力關係。

sentences.english: The security members handled the situation in accord with the procedures.
sentences.chinese: 警衛部隊根據程序處理了局勢。

sentences.english: Tensions had escalated since Japan detained the Chinese captain.
sentences.chinese: 日方扣留中方船長是雙方緊張局勢升級。

sentences.english: The world situation is characterized by turbulence and intranquility.

definition: variant of 動蕩|动荡[dong4 dang4]
to become hot/temperature rise/(fig.) to intensify/to hot up/to escalate/to get a boost
to undulate/to fluctuate/wave motion/rise and fall
